attributes.action: Make political party manifestos a legally binding contract.
attributes.additional_details: Because they need to be held accountable for the lies they tell to get elected.
attributes.background: Political manifestos are used to encourage voters to vote based on what  is deemed to be a priority. These are always based on promises that they will break. It's about time that manifestos were made a legally binding contract, so that courts could intervene and fine the party.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700035
